entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
